original_text:
People, despite their wealth, do not endure;
    they are like the beasts that perish.
korean_text: 사람은 존귀하나 장구하지 못함이여 멸망하는 짐승 같도다

sentences.original_text: People, despite their wealth, do not endure
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그들의 부에도 불구하고 영원하지 못하며

sentences.original_text: they are like the beasts that perish
